alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 7:44PM MST until December 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 7 inches. * WHERE...The Southern Front Range Foothills and Palmer Divide, including the communities of Castle Rock, Conifer, Perry Park, and Elizabeth. * WHEN...From 8 PM Friday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, including for I-25 between Centennial and Colorado Springs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Colorado can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by going to www.cotrip.org.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; Jefferson and West Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet, Gilpin, Clear Creek, Northeast Park Counties Below 9000 Feet
